story_zako_battle_26_06/3701_0101_0100_1: Hehehe. We’re the strongest sync pairs around!
story_zako_battle_26_06/3701_0101_0200_1: We’ll show you how it’s done!
story_zako_battle_26_06/3701_0501_0200_1: Don’t let them see you cry!
story_zako_battle_26_06/3701_0501_0300_1:
We’re supposed to be the strongest sync pairs
around! Emotionally, that is!
story_zako_battle_26_06/3801_0101_0100_1:
My team disbanded and left me all alone. Why did
I ever even try in the first place?
story_zako_battle_26_06/3801_0101_0200_1:
You don’t want me to give up on battling? But I
don’t even have a team anymore!
story_zako_battle_26_06/3801_0101_0300_1: I hear you’re looking for a team!
story_zako_battle_26_06/3801_0101_0400_1: Allow us to be of assistance!
story_zako_battle_26_06/3801_0501_0100_1:
Even the slightest thing seems like the end of the
world when you’re young. It’s perfectly fine
to worry.
story_zako_battle_26_06/3801_0501_0300_1:
there are grown-ups out there looking out for
you. Don’t forget that!
